"}]}]}], "exclusions": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}], "detailedDescription_md": "**Detailed** \nTeelu Rauteli Special Pension Scheme is started by the Social Welfare Department (Government of Uttarakhand) for physically handicapped women/men Farmers. Under this scheme, the government provides financial assistance of Rs. 1200 per month for disabled women /men who are engaged in agriculture work or agriculture-related business in the state.

ctu_text: \n2. There is no provision for an income limit in this monthly scheme and the scheme is applicable from April 01, 2014. \n3. The benefit of the scheme will be admissible to such rural women and men, who are between 20 to 40 years of a present disability.

1. The applicant's age should be between 18 to 60.
